title: Request for an SMS Message API to store messages
content:
Request for an SMS Message API to store messages.  When assigning a different app to SMS, the files are still stored under a system default message folder and cannot be altered.  I'm requesting an API to all the SMS app to determine where to write those files with a default stub to go to the system message folder.
Specifically, Signal cannot save SMS messages to the message thread because it doesn't write to the default SMS folder.  It can send & receive but sent files are not visible.
